alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Lake; Mason; Muskegon; Newaygo; Oceana; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 10:04PM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow showers early tonight near US-31, north of Holland should diminish by midnight but not come to an end. Snowfall tonight from Grand Haven to Muskegon, near US-31 could be as much as 4 inches locally. Additional snow showers, locally heavy move back into the area Friday afternoon and continue into Saturday morning. These snow showers should get father inland. Storm total snowfall of up to 8 inches by Saturday morning. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Michigan. * WHEN...Till 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibilities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavier snow bands near US-31 this evening should weaken after midnight. Additional heavier snow bands will form Friday afternoon and continue into Saturday morning. These snow showers will reach the US-131 area so the heavy snowfall will be farther inland by Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Allegan; Lake; Mason; Muskegon; Newaygo; Oceana; Ottawa
